column5: Has anyone recently seen the moonshine casting spoons anywhere in the west end. My glow Cleos are getting old and not holding a charge at all. Was out casting last night and saw the moonshine spoons in action.  Saw a few dirty old boots jumping around the breakwall but other than that it was deadly quiet.
picked some moonshine up at pete's tackle in st catherines, other than that I found bronte outdoors sells pete spoons.
You can get moonshine spoons at Bill Bait on the Hamilton mountain. He has a large variety of them. Grimsby tackle has them but they are low I believe.
You could re-paint them, or use glow tape.
I thought I saw some of those Moonshine spoons at Sail in Burlington this past weekend.
